title: The Ghosts' Tribunal
outcome: Restored 'ghost' citizens organize the first public tribunal since the BCI's inception, demanding Council figures account for years of disappearances, score manipulation, and privilege abuses. As crowds rally and testimonies flood the city, public memory resurfaces and fractures deepen between Council factions. Oksana Lintz is forced to reveal the technical secrets behind erasure and restoration protocols as Directorate operatives try to sabotage the proceedings, but Harmonists counter with exposure of past cover-ups.

events.description: Restored 'ghosts' organize a public tribunal broadcast citywide, demanding Council members explain past abuses and disappearances.
Thousands attend open forums and recount erased memories; sympathy for the 'ghosts' sparks increased unrest and calls for justice.
Oksana Lintz testifies to technical causes of erasure and restoration, exposing cracks and shortfalls in the BCI and Council authority.
Directorate operatives attempt digital sabotage of tribunal feeds; Harmonist techs counter by leaking evidence of past Directorate cover-ups.
A citywide vote is scheduled on dissolving key Council powers, leaving BCI authority uncertain and fracturing the ruling body.
